game.name: Slylighter
game.desc: Description: The star fell out of the sky and hit a bunch of houses when it landed. Now it's too bright to navigate back home. Turn off all the lights to make the other stars come out so you can go home. Features 3 levels of difficulty. Controls: * Arrow Keys - move to a different house * X - toggle the currently selected house * Z - skip animation at the beginning * P - pause menu to access other difficulties
